DateTimeConverterView.Title: Date and Time Converter
DateTimeConverterView.Description: Convert date and time into various different formats.

JsonToYamlView.Title: JSON to YAML Converter
JsonToYamlView.Description: Use the online converter to convert JSON into YAML.

YamlToJsonView.Title: YAML to JSON Converter
YamlToJsonView.Description: Use this online converter to convert YAML into JSON.

ImageToIconView.Title: Convert Image to ICO Icon
ImageToIconView.ChoiceSourceImageDescription: Image files (formats: png, jpg, jpeg, ico, webp)
ImageToIconView.ChoiceSourceImageDialogTitle: Please select the image to be converted
ImageToIconView.MemoContent1: ICO files are generally used for web page logos and application logos.
ImageToIconView.MemoContent2: When using an ICO file on a web page, usually name the generated ICO file as "favicon.ico", put it in the root directory of the website, and then add the following code to the <head> tag of the page: <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
